trans-unit.source: Provides data for various events that report changes to the mouse wheel delta value of a mouse device.
trans-unit.target: 为报告鼠标设备的鼠标滚轮增量值更改的各事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs> is used with the following events:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs> 适用于以下事件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType> (attached event)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType> （附加的事件）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType> (attached event)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType> （附加的事件）

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A> property is positive if the mouse wheel is moved upward or forward (away from the user) or negative if the mouse wheel is moved downward or backward (toward the user).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A>属性为正如果向上移动鼠标滚轮或转发 （远离用户） 或负如果向下移动鼠标滚轮或反向 （向前用户）。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised even for small mouse wheel movements.
trans-unit.target: 即使对于小鼠标滚轮移动，将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: For some scenarios, it is appropriate to implement handlers that throttle small mouse wheel deltas by checking whether the delta exceeds a certain threshold.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，最好实现通过检查增量是否超过特定阈值限制鼠标滚轮小增量的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you might invoke your handler for cases where the mouse wheel delta was so small that any UI that is tied to the mouse wheel movement would not update.
trans-unit.target: 否则，可能调用该处理程序的鼠标滚轮增量已太小，不会更新与鼠标滚轮移动任何 UI 的情况。

trans-unit.source: Exactly how you implement the threshold behavior in a handler and what that threshold should be is entirely implementation-specific.
trans-unit.target: 完全如何在处理程序中实现的阈值行为，以及该阈值应是完全特定于实现。

trans-unit.source: The following example moves a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> up if the mouse wheel <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A> is positive and moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> down if the mouse wheel <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A> is negative.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>如果鼠标滚轮<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A>为正，并将移动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>下如果鼠标滚轮<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A>为负。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>附加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 与此事件关联的鼠标设备。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生输入的时间。

trans-unit.source: The amount the wheel has changed.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标滚轮的变更量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the amount that the mouse wheel has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示鼠标滚轮变更量的值。

trans-unit.source: The amount the wheel has changed.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标滚轮的变更量。

trans-unit.source: This value is positive if the mouse wheel is rotated in an upward direction (away from the user) or negative if the mouse wheel is rotated in a downward direction (toward the user).
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标滚轮朝上旋转（背离用户的方向），则该值为正；如果鼠标滚轮朝下旋转（朝着用户的方向），则该值为负。

trans-unit.source: The effective upper and lower ranges of this value potentially come from device implementations or other callers that raised the event, and are therefore not defined.
trans-unit.target: 此值的有效上限和下限范围可能来自于设备实现或引发该事件，并因此不定义其他调用方。

trans-unit.source: The following example moves a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> up if the mouse wheel <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A> is positive and moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> down if the mouse wheel <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A> is negative.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>如果鼠标滚轮<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A>为正，并将移动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>下如果鼠标滚轮<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A>为负。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>附加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 以特定于类型的方式调用的一般处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 要对其调用处理程序的目标。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 以特定于类型的方式调用事件处理程序，这样做可以提高事件系统效率。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将强制转换为的泛型处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventHandler>，然后调用它。

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此实现模式和它的原因的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。
